task.title: Copy Edges
task.shortdesc: Copying edges of 3D solids are similar to copying faces of 3D solids. All edges are copied as the independent lines, arcs, ellipses or spline objects. However, the properties keep the same as the cur ent layer. After you specify the location of placing the copy, you can performone of the following methods:

ul.li: Basepoint: You must specify two points on the drawing. The first one is a base point; the other one determines the location of the copy.
Vector: You need to specify a point to determine the location of the copy. The base point is the original point (0,0,0).

step.cmd: Choose Modify > Solids Editing > Copy Edges from the main menu.
Select the edge(s) to copy, and press Enter.

result.p: Left: Specify the edge(s) to copy (A), the base point (B), and the endpoint(C) Right: The resulting entity with the edge copied
